name: UNIVERSITY OF PERPETUAL HELP
about: The University of Perpetual Help System Dalta's School of Aviation is a premier institution dedicated to excellence in aviation education and training. Accredited by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP) and the Commission on Higher Education (CHED), the school offers comprehensive programs such as the BS in Aircraft Maintenance Technology and the Commercial Pilot Licensure Course. With highly qualified faculty having extensive industry experience, students are prepared for leading roles in aircraft maintenance, operation, and aviation education. The school's modern facilities and adherence to international standards ensure students receive top-notch training, enabling them to become globally competitive aviation professionals. The University's mission is to develop dynamic students committed to the highest quality of life in aviation, nurturing the values of "Helpers of God" and contributing to nation building.
